trans-unit.source: Defines interfaces used by internal .NET structures to initialize application configuration properties.
trans-unit.target: 定义内部.NET 结构用于初始化应用程序配置属性的接口。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a context object for a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> of an application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回的上下文对象<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>的应用程序配置。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示应用程序配置文件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a subpath location of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 表示配置元素的子路径位置的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A context object for a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object of an application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于的上下文对象<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>的应用程序配置的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a deprecated context object of the application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回应用程序配置的已否决的上下文对象。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a path to an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示到应用程序配置文件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A deprecated context object of the application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序配置一个不推荐使用的上下文对象。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an encrypted configuration section and returns it as a string.
trans-unit.target: 解密的加密的配置节，并将其作为字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: An encrypted XML string representing a configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 一个加密的 XML 字符串，可表示一个配置节。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A decrypted configuration section as a string.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串形式的已解密的配置节。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 删除<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象执行 I/O 任务应用程序配置文件。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示的名称的字符串<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象执行 I/O 任务的配置文件。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Encrypts a configuration section and returns it as a string.
trans-unit.target: 加密配置节，并将其作为字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: An XML string representing a configuration section to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置节进行加密的 XML 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: An encrypted configuration section represented as a string.
trans-unit.target: 加密的配置节，表示为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the complete path to an application configuration file based on the location subpath.
trans-unit.target: 返回到应用程序配置文件基于位置的子路径的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示应用程序配置文件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The subpath location of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的子路径位置。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the complete path to an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示应用程序配置文件的完整路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Type>对象，表示配置对象类型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type name
trans-unit.target: 类型名称

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to throw an exception if an error occurs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>对象，表示配置对象类型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representing a type name from the <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示中的类型名称字符串<xref:System.Type>对象，表示配置的类型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the type name from a <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 表示来自的类型名称的字符串<xref:System.Type>对象，表示配置的类型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Associates the configuration with a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将相关联的配置<xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object to associate with the configuration.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>要关联的配置对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the configuration host is has completed building associated permissions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示配置主机是已完成的生成关联的权限;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 表示配置文件名称的字符串与<xref:System.IO.Stream>上配置文件的 I/O 任务。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.

trans-unit.target: 版本<xref:System.IO.Stream>与配置文件相关联的对象。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Instructs the host to impersonate and returns an <xref:System.IDisposable> object required by the internal .NET structure.
trans-unit.target: 指示要模拟的主机，并返回<xref:System.IDisposable>所需的内部的.NET 结构的对象。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IDisposable>值。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the configuration file is located at a higher level in the configuration hierarchy than the application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否在配置文件时的配置层次结构中级别比应用程序配置更高版本所在。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示应用程序配置文件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> the configuration file is located at a higher level in the configuration hierarchy than the application configuration; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>配置文件位于配置层次结构中级别比应用程序配置中; 高否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a child record is required for a child configuration path.

trans-unit.source: Determines if a different <xref:System.Type> definition is allowable for an application configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 确定具有不同<xref:System.Type>定义是允许的应用程序配置对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> attribute to disable implicit link demands.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值的配置节，是否需要完全受信任的代码访问安全级别，并且不允许<xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute>特性禁用隐式链接请求。</xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> attribute to disable implicit link demands; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果需要完全受信任的代码访问安全级别的配置节，并且不允许<xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute>属性来禁用隐式链接要求; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Returns the object specified by streamName.
